section.heading: District health benefits.
section.text: The District shall provide health benefits as set forth in § 1-621.05 to all employees of the District first employed after September 30, 1987, except those specifically excluded by law or by rule.

annotations.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 1987, D.C. Law 7-27, § 2(d), 34 DCR 5079
